channel.title: Hello! on Gabe (willitcode)

item.title: Test Post
item.description: This is a test post so that I can see how the post features are gonna work.

item.title: Contact Me
item.description:
You can contact me through email at gabe [at] willitcode [dot] com. (Not a mailto link or typed out normally to hopefully dodge some of the spambots).

If you’re emailing me, my PGP public key is available on keys.openpgp.org. Download it from that link or via your favorite OpenPGP software and let’s encrypt our emails!

I can also be contacted on Discord at @willitcode or on any of my other social medias.

item.title: Resumé
item.description: You can download a copy of my resumé. Note that this version has some information (such as my address and contact info) removed for my privacy. If you’d like a copy that has this info, please contact me.
